title: How to Log Out of Instagram Account That Is Remembered

steps.title: Open Instagram on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open Instagram on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. The Instagram app icon has a multi-colored background with a white camera icon inside.

steps.title: Tap on your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap on your profile picture. This is located in the bottom right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap on the three lines icon.
steps.content: Tap on the three lines icon. This is located in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap on Settings.
steps.content: Tap on Settings . This is located at the top of the dropdown menu, and there is a gear icon next to it. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap on Security.
steps.content: Tap on Security . This is located near the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap on Saved Login Info.
steps.content: Tap on Saved Login Info . This is located near the top, and there is a keyhole icon next to it.

steps.title: Tap on the blue toggle button.
steps.content: Tap on the blue toggle button. This is located next to Saved Login Info . This will turn off the account remember setting.

steps.title: Tap on the back arrow twice.
steps.content: Tap on the back arrow twice. This is in the top left corner.

steps.title: Tap on Log Out.
steps.content: Tap on Log Out . This is located at the very bottom of your screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap on Not Now and choose Log Out.
steps.content: Tap on Not Now and choose Log Out . This means that your account will no longer be remembered on Instagram when you go back to log-in. You have now successfully logged out of an Instagram account that was remembered.
